LDAP Chai API

Package com.novell.ldapchai.provider

Components to maintain and manage the actual connection to the ldap directory.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ChaiProvider ChaiProvider is the foundation interface for the LDAP Chai API.
ChaiProviderImplementor Service Provider Interface (SPI) required for ChaiProvider implementations.
ProviderStatistics Tracks the statistics for a ChaiProvider.
 

Class Summary
ChaiConfiguration LDAP Chai API configuration settings.
ChaiProviderFactory Static factory methods for obtaining an ChaiProvider.
JLDAPProviderImpl JLDAP ChaiProvider implementation.
JNDIProviderImpl Default ChaiProvider implementation; wraps the standard JNDI ldap API.
 

Enum Summary
ChaiProvider.DIRECTORY_VENDOR  
ChaiProvider.SEARCH_SCOPE LDAP search scope of BASE, ONE or SUBTREE.
ChaiProviderImplementor.ConnectionState Current status of the ChaiProvider instance.
ChaiSetting All settings for LDAP Chai used by ChaiConfiguration.
ProviderStatistics.Statistic Enumeration of available statistics.
 

Annotation Types Summary
ChaiProviderImplementor.LdapOperation Indicates if the method is actually performing an ldap operation.
ChaiProviderImplementor.ModifyOperation Indicates if the method may cause a modification of the directory
ChaiProviderImplementor.SearchOperation Indicates if the method will issue a search request to the directory
 

Package com.novell.ldapchai.provider Description

Components to maintain and manage the actual connection to the ldap directory.

Author:
Jason D. Rivard
